name: Pac - Man Scatter
description: Welcome To Pac-Man Scatter here are the instructions:  -Collect Pac Pellets (Yellow Dots) -Collect Power Pellets(big Pac pellets) [let ghosts run into you don't run into them] -Avoid Walls -Avoid Ghosts -Comment Score Below -[if you die refresh the page] play on game jolt here https://gamejolt.com/games/Pac-Scatter/604036 play on scratch here:https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/511222187/
